channel.title: Comments on: Hobby-centric Social Network site Hobeze launches

item.title: By: Mark
item.dc:creator: Mark
item.description: I signed upto Hobeze.com last week, its a really cool site I was v impressed. The new user management system is superb.
item.content:encoded: I signed upto Hobeze.com last week, its a really cool site I was v impressed. The new user management system is superb.

item.title: By: Stephen
item.dc:creator: Stephen
item.description: Wow, this is an interesting one! i like the idea, i think it is only a matter of time before it becomes one of the big ones! One to keep a sharp eye on!
item.content:encoded: Wow, this is an interesting one! i like the idea, i think it is only a matter of time before it becomes one of the big ones! One to keep a sharp eye on!
